name: A MAZE. SPACE
description:
!USE [SHIFT] + [TAB] TO HAVE AN ALWAYS VISIBLE CHAT DURING MOVEMENT!

A MAZE. / SPACE is created for the "total digital edition" of  A MAZE. / Berlin 2020 - 9th International Games and Playful Media Festival.  Our new interactive space is built on Linke’s museum experience “Neo-Brutalism of Tomorrow”. The A MAZE. / SPACE is an exhibition and festival space where the attendees can interact with this years’ A MAZE. selection, can be a flamingo, chat with flamingo friends, shoot confetti , play soccer with watermelons, drink beer, hang out in the garden and enjoy the live stream of the full festival program. 

The selection is featuring the nominees, honorable mentions of the A MAZE. Awards and other digital surprises.

Produced by A MAZE. / @AMazeFest
